mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PJ_INFO P INNER JOIN MBR_INFO M ON P.ORDR_ID = M.EMIL_ADDR
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'PJ-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_INFO_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PJ_INFO (PJ_ID, ORDR_ID, OBTN_ID, PJ_TTL, RGSTR_DT, STRT_DT, END_DT, CNTRCT_ACCNT, PJ_DESC, IS_DLT, DLT_DT, LST_MOD_DT, IS_RCRUT_ADD, PJ_STT, VIEW_CNT, PJ_RCRUT_CNT, PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT, PJ_RCRUT_END_DT) VALUES (#{pjId}, #{ordrId}, NULL, #{pjTtl}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{strtDt},'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{cntrctAccnt}, #{pjDesc}, 0, NULL, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0, TO_DATE(#{pjRcrutStrtDt},'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{pjRcrutEndDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

SELECT 'PJ-APPLY' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_APPLY_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PJ_APPLY (PJ_APPLY_ID, EMIL_ADDR, PJ_ID, PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, PJ_APPLY_TTL, PJ_APPLY_DESC) VALUES (#{pjApplyId}, #{emilAddr}, #{pjId}, SYSDATE, #{pjApplyTtl}, #{pjApplyDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT PJ_ID ,ORDR_ID ,OBTN_ID ,PJ_TTL ,RGSTR_DT ,STRT_DT ,END_DT ,CNTRCT_ACCNT ,PJ_DESC ,IS_DLT ,DLT_DT ,LST_MOD_DT ,IS_RCRUT_ADD ,PJ_STT ,VIEW_CNT ,PJ_RCRUT_CNT ,PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT ,PJ_RCRUT_END_DT FROM PJ_INFO WHERE ORDR_ID = #{_parameter} AND PJ_STT NOT IN 4 AND IS_DLT = 0

SELECT P.PJ_APPLY_ID , P.EMIL_ADDR , P.PJ_ID , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT , P.PJ_APPLY_TTL , P.PJ_APPLY_DESC , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_ID , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_URL , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_URL_NONREAD FROM PJ_APPLY P JOIN PJ_APPLY_ATT PA ON P.PJ_APPLY_ID = PA.PJ_APPLY_ID WHERE P.PJ_ID = #{pjId} AND P.EMIL_ADDR = #{emilAddr}

SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , II.INDSTR_NM FROM PJ_INFO P INNER JOIN MBR_INFO M ON P.ORDR_ID = M.EMIL_ADDR JOIN PJ_INDSTR PN ON PN.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON II.INDSTR_ID = PN.SMJR_ID WHERE P.OBTN_ID IS NULL
ORDER BY
P.RGSTR_DT DESC P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT ASC P.CNTRCT_ACCNT DESC P.RGSTR_DT DESC

SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_DLT , TO_CHAR(P.DLT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DLT_DT , P.LST_MOD_DT , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , PI.PJ_INDSTR_ID , PI.MJR_ID , PI.SMJR_ID , PPS.PJ_PRM_STK_ID , II.INDSTR_ID , II.INDSTR_NM , II.UPPR_INDSTR_ID , PRM.PRM_STK_ID , PRM.PRM_STK , PA.PJ_APPLY_ID , PA.EMIL_ADDR APPLY_EMIL_ADDR , PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT , PJ_APPLY_TTL , PJ_APPLY_DESC , PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT , PY.PYMNT_ID , PY.GRNT_AMT , PY.CNTRCT_AMT , PY.GRNT_PD_DT , PY.CNTRCT_PD_DT , PY.ACCNT_NM , PY.PYMNT_TYP , PY.IMP_UID , PY.DPST_RFND_AMNT , PY.DPST_RFND_DT FROM PJ_INFO P LEFT JOIN PJ_INDSTR PI ON P.PJ_ID = PI.PJ_ID LEFT JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON II.INDSTR_ID = PI.SMJR_ID LEFT JOIN PJ_PRM_STK PPS ON PPS.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID LEFT JOIN PRM_STK PRM ON PRM.PRM_STK_ID = PPS.PRM_STK_ID LEFT JOIN PJ_APPLY PA ON PA.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID LEFT JOIN PYMNT_INFO PY ON PY.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID WHERE P.PJ_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM , S.* FROM (SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , II.INDSTR_NM FROM PJ_INFO P INNER JOIN MBR_INFO M ON P.ORDR_ID = M.EMIL_ADDR JOIN PJ_INDSTR PN ON PN.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON II.INDSTR_ID = PN.SMJR_ID WHERE P.OBTN_ID IS NULL
AND (P.PJ_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR P.PJ_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND P.PJ_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.PJ_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND (P.PJ_STT = 0 OR P.PJ_STT = 3) ORDER BY P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT ASC
ORDER BY P.RGSTR_DT DESC
ORDER BY P.CNTRCT_ACCNT DESC
ORDER BY P.RGSTR_DT DESC
) S
WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{currPageNo} + 1) * #{exposureListSize} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{currPageNo} * #{exposureListSize} + 1

SELECT LEVEL as LV , p.PJ_CMMNT_ID , p.PJ_ID , p.PRNT_CMMNT_ID , p.CMMNT_CNTNT , p.CRTD_DT , p.LST_MOD_DT , p.IS_DLT , p.DLT_DT , p.ATHR_ID , m.MBR_NM FROM PJ_CMMNT p INNER JOIN MBR_INFO m ON p.ATHR_ID = m.EMIL_ADDR WHERE PJ_ID = #{_parameter}
START WITH PRNT_CMMNT_ID IS NULL AND IS_DLT = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR PJ_CMMNT_ID = PRNT_CMMNT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY CRTD_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PJ_CMMNT SET DLT_DT = SYSDATE , IS_DLT = 1 WHERE PJ_CMMNT_ID IN ( SELECT PJ_CMMNT_ID FROM PJ_CMMNT START WITH PRNT_CMMNT_ID IS NULL AND IS_DLT = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR PJ_CMMNT_ID = PRNT_CMMNT_ID )
UPDATE PJ_CMMNT SET DLT_DT = SYSDATE , IS_DLT = 1 WHERE PJ_CMMNT_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_CMMNT ( PJ_CMMNT_ID , PJ_ID , PRNT_CMMNT_ID , CMMNT_CNTNT , CRTD_DT , LST_MOD_DT , IS_DLT , DLT_DT , ATHR_ID) VALUES( PJ_CMMNT_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{pjId} , #{prntCmmntId} , #{cmmntCntnt} , SYSDATE , NULL , 0 , NULL , #{athrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM , S.* FROM ( SELECT LEVEL as LV , p.PJ_CMMNT_ID , p.PJ_ID , p.PRNT_CMMNT_ID , p.CMMNT_CNTNT , p.CRTD_DT , p.LST_MOD_DT , p.IS_DLT , p.DLT_DT , p.ATHR_ID , m.MBR_NM FROM PJ_CMMNT p INNER JOIN MBR_INFO m ON p.ATHR_ID = m.EMIL_ADDR WHERE PJ_ID = #{searchIdParam} START WITH PRNT_CMMNT_ID IS NULL AND IS_DLT = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR PJ_CMMNT_ID = PRNT_CMMNT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY CRTD_DT DESC ) S WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{currPageNo} + 1)*#{exposureListSize} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{currPageNo} * #{exposureListSize} + 1
mapper.update: UPDATE PJ_INFO SET PJ_TTL=#{pjTtl}, CNTRCT_ACCNT=#{cntrctAccnt}, PJ_DESC=#{pjDesc}, LST_MOD_DT=SYSDATE, PJ_RCRUT_CNT=#{pjRcrutCnt}, WHERE PJ_ID=#{pjId}

UPDATE PJ_INFO SET PJ_TTL = #{pjTtl}, STRT_DT = #{strtDt}, END_DT = #{endDt}, CNTRCT_ACCNT = #{cntrctAccnt}, PJ_DESC = #{pjDesc}, IS_RCRUT_ADD = 1, PJ_RCRUT_CNT = #{pjRcrutCnt}, PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT = #{pjRcrutStrtDt}, PJ_RCRUT_END_DT = #{pjRcrutEndDt}, PJ_STT = 3, LST_MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PJ_ID = #{pjId}
UPDATE PJ_INFO SET IS_DLT = 1, DLT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PJ_ID = #{_parameter}
UPDATE PJ_INFO SET OBTN_ID = #{emilAddr}, PJ_STT = 2 WHERE PJ_ID = #{pjId}
mapper.select: SELECT P.PJ_APPLY_ID , M.EMIL_ADDR , M.MBR_CTGRY , M.CMP_ID , P.PJ_ID , P.PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT , P.PJ_APPLY_TTL , P.PJ_APPLY_DESC , P.PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_ID , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_URL FROM PJ_APPLY P JOIN MBR_INFO M ON M.EMIL_ADDR = P.EMIL_ADDR LEFT JOIN PJ_APPLY_ATT PA ON PA.PJ_APPLY_ID = P.PJ_APPLY_ID WHERE p.PJ_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT * FROM PJ_INFO PI JOIN PJ_INDSTR PIND ON PI.PJ_ID = PIND.PJ_ID JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON PIND.SMJR_ID = II.INDSTR_ID JOIN MBR_INFO MI ON PI.ORDR_ID = MI.EMIL_ADDR JOIN MBR_INFO MI2 ON MI.CMP_ID = MI2.CMP_ID WHERE MI2.EMIL_ADDR = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_SCRP (PJ_SCRP_ID ,EMIL_ADDR ,PJ_ID) VALUES ('AL-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')|| '-' || LPAD(PJ_SCRP_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{emilAddr} , #{pjId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PJ_PRM_STK PPS JOIN PRM_STK PS ON PPS.PRM_STK_ID = PS.PRM_STK_ID WHERE PPS.PJ_ID = (SELECT PJ_ID FROM PJ_INFO PI WHERE PJ_ID = #{_parameter})
SELECT * FROM PJ_INDSTR PI LEFT JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON PI.SMJR_ID = II.INDSTR_ID WHERE PI.PJ_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_INDSTR ( PJ_INDSTR_ID , PJ_ID , MJR_ID , SMJR_ID ) VALUES ( 'PN' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_INDSTR_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{pjId} , #{mjrId} , #{smjrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT PJ_APPLY_ID, EMIL_ADDR, PJ_ID, PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, PJ_APPLY_TTL, PJ_APPLY_DESC, PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT FROM PJ_APPLY PA WHERE PJ_ID = #{pjId}
SELECT PJ_APPLY_ID, EMIL_ADDR, PJ_ID, PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, PJ_APPLY_TTL, PJ_APPLY_DESC, PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT FROM PJ_APPLY PA WHERE PJ_ID = #{pjId} AND PJ_APPLY_ID = #{pjApplyId}
SELECT PJ_APPLY_ID, EMIL_ADDR, PJ_ID, PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, PJ_APPLY_TTL, PJ_APPLY_DESC, PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT FROM PJ_APPLY WHERE EMIL_ADDR = #{emilAddr} AND PJ_ID = #{pjId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_PRM_STK (PJ_PRM_STK_ID , PJ_ID , PRM_STK_ID) VALUES ('PJ-PRM-STK' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_PRM_STK_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{pjId} , #{prmStkId})
mapper.select: SELECT PRM_STK_ID , PRM_STK FROM PRM_STK

SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_DLT , TO_CHAR(P.DLT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DLT_DT , P.LST_MOD_DT , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , PI.PJ_INDSTR_ID , PI.MJR_ID , PI.SMJR_ID , PPS.PJ_PRM_STK_ID , II.INDSTR_ID , II.INDSTR_NM , II.UPPR_INDSTR_ID , PRM.PRM_STK_ID , PRM.PRM_STK , PA.PJ_APPLY_ID , PA.EMIL_ADDR APPLY_EMIL_ADDR FROM PJ_INFO P LEFT JOIN PJ_INDSTR PI ON P.PJ_ID = PI.PJ_ID LEFT JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON II.INDSTR_ID = PI.SMJR_ID LEFT JOIN PJ_PRM_STK PPS ON PPS.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID LEFT JOIN PRM_STK PRM ON PRM.PRM_STK_ID = PPS.PRM_STK_ID LEFT JOIN PJ_APPLY PA ON PA.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID WHERE P.OBTN_ID IS NULL AND P.PJ_STT IN (0,3)

SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_DLT , TO_CHAR(P.DLT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DLT_DT , P.LST_MOD_DT , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , PI.PJ_INDSTR_ID , PI.MJR_ID , PI.SMJR_ID , PPS.PJ_PRM_STK_ID , II.INDSTR_ID , II.INDSTR_NM , II.UPPR_INDSTR_ID , PRM.PRM_STK_ID , PRM.PRM_STK FROM PJ_INFO P JOIN PJ_INDSTR PI ON P.PJ_ID = PI.PJ_ID JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON II.INDSTR_ID = PI.SMJR_ID LEFT JOIN PJ_PRM_STK PPS ON PPS.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID LEFT JOIN PRM_STK PRM ON PRM.PRM_STK_ID = PPS.PRM_STK_ID WHERE P.ORDR_ID IN (SELECT EMIL_ADDR FROM MBR_INFO MI WHERE MI.CMP_ID = #{_parameter})
mapper.update: UPDATE PJ_INFO SET PJ_RCRUT_END_DT = TO_DATE(#{pjRcrutEndDt},'YYYY-MM-DD') , PJ_STT = 3 WHERE PJ_ID = #{pjId}
mapper.select: SELECT PY.PJ_APPLY_ID , PY.EMIL_ADDR , PY.PJ_ID , TO_CHAR(PY.PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT , PY.PJ_APPLY_TTL , PY.PJ_APPLY_DESC , TO_CHAR(PY.PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT , PT.PJ_APPLY_ATT_ID , PT.PJ_APPLY_ID , PT.PJ_APPLY_ATT_URL , PT.PJ_APPLY_ATT_URL_NONREAD FROM PJ_APPLY PY LEFT JOIN PJ_APPLY_ATT PT ON PT.PJ_APPLY_ID = PY.PJ_APPLY_ID WHERE PY.PJ_APPLY_ID = #{_parameter}
